articles.description: 馬斯克（Elon Musk）透露正在籌備人工智慧（AI）新計畫，準備挑戰微軟（Microsoft）及 OpenAI。 馬斯克 23 日接受華爾街日報專訪時透露，他所成立的AI新創商「X.AI」可能會在「某種程度上」導入特斯拉（Tesla Inc.）及Twitter的技術。「OpenAI跟微軟的關係似...

articles.title: World's richest person Bernard Arnault's wealth drops by $11 billion — meaning Elon Musk is once again closer to the top spot
articles.description: Arnault is now worth $192 billion. The Frenchman narrowed his lead over Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk to about $12 billion.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: US has 'real concern' about Tesla Autopilot driver interaction
articles.description: U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said Tuesday there are concerns about the interaction between Tesla's advanced driver assistance system Autopilot and drivers that is the subject of an ongoing government investigation.
